roleset.name: check (for), examine (again), check for or examine, again
roleset.note: RETEST-V NOTES: I don't know that arg2 will ever actually appear. (from retest.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: A Toto spokesman said the toilet not only retests blood pressure, pulse and urine, it also stores the data for up to 130 days.

example.name: all args
example.text: John retested Mary for violent tendencies.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Retesting of the evidence was supposed to conclude by May 9 so the results could be presented on May 21 to a jury of two judges and six citizens.
